description: super fast on my HPE DL380p Gen8, I gave it 32GB and have had nothing but good times with it!
summary: Quick install and pretty snappy. Easiest Hackintosh EVER!-

description: I have tried Virtualbox, VMWare and found this solution to the be the easiest to setup and with decent performance with 2GB RAM on an Core i3 machine. I would definitely recommend this to folks looking to get an experience of MacOS.
THIS APP DO NOT WORK!!
unlock the DISK!
Do your research, but it is pretty straightforward. Test it and enjoy. Brag a little bit about your system.
Runs smooth with limitations of course.
Pretty fast and easy to set up!
I have been searching for a way to run macOS on my computer for a very long time now, now that I found this, now I can! It is very easy to use, and is very good at what it does.
i have LVM partitioning system, i think thats the reason for not running on my ubuntu system, 16 gb ram core i5 processor

Who this is the best way to virtualize MacOS. IMO this way fast and efficient. It runs MacOS like its native. Best part of all is that you can passthrough devices including GPUs. The only downsite is that there is absalotely no documentaion. Overall really impressive.
Thank you for your job!

I once installed macos through virtualbox. That was a painful experience and I couldn't do anything after i got it running. But Sosumi made it easy as installing ubuntu. It would be great if there was a option to save the big files on a separate pertition.
summary: Great app. But edit the default ram. 4GB=ok; 8GB=recommended .?️❤️

description: Was able to install Catalina. Howver, Software Rendering not working..

If you want to plug in Iphone or external drive you out of luck. Qemu machine installed by the app is an old version, in the new versions of the Qemu this problem apparently has been fixed. This issue is still open on the developer site. If the problem is fixed, i will install it again.
summary: Good app, but the usb ports are not working, and it is not use for me

description:
I tried first installing it on an older AMD laptop on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS but it kept crashing because it couldn't start KVM. Next i tried manjaro which didn't install at all. Then i tried Linux Lite which worked and started up but after i pressed start macos installer in clover it just hung while booting. Here is the log:
